text: i can’t believe jeff made y’all buy ugly ass shirts to “fight coronavirus” when 1) making a shirt means people are working in factories, meaning they’re really not fighting the virus and 2) they’re sending digital downloads to keep harry in the charts.. embarrassing EMBARRASSING
